name: Teeworlds
description: Teeworlds is a multiplayer FPS with cartoon graphics. FPS style game settings are adopted, including key layout, movements and weapons. In the game, you will act as a small cartoon character and join a huge battle. You can challenge in team battle mode, personal battle mode or the peculiar team mission mode.

en_US.description: Teeworlds is a multiplayer FPS with cartoon graphics. FPS style game settings are adopted, including key layout, movements and weapons. In the game, you will act as a small cartoon character and join a huge battle. You can challenge in team battle mode, personal battle mode or the peculiar team mission mode.
en_US.name: Teeworlds

zh_CN.description: Teeworlds是一款多人动作的射击游戏，具有卡通化的画面，使用FPS风格的各种游戏设置，包括键位、移动和武器等。游戏中，您将化身为一个小小的卡通人物，参与到一场巨大的战斗之中。您可以选择团队战斗、个人战斗或者特有的组队过关模式来挑战。
zh_CN.name: Teeworlds
